title: Smartphone penetration as share of population in Indonesia 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Share of population with a smartphone
summary: The statistic depicts the smartphone penetration in Indonesia as Share of the population from 2017 to 2023 .
In 2017 , 24 % of the population in Indonesia used a smartphone .
